attributes.action: continue allowing Seamen on all vessels regardless of the work the vessel performs to claim their SED
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The HMRC have changed the classification of many vessels used by thousands of British seamen (and women)with regards to the individual persons SED claim.  This will decimate an already depleted industry where younger generations do not view it as a viable career.  We need to have the guidelines reversed to maintain Britain at the forefront of Shipping, where we belong.
